author: Al Jazeera
title: COVID-19: WHO boss calls for 'honest' leadership from US, China
description: Tedros urges US, China to unite in fight against coronavirus pandemic after Trump threatened to review US funding.
content:
The head of the World Health Organization defended his agency's handling of the coronavirus pandemic, calling on leaders to not "politicise" the situation and focus on saving lives threatened by COVID-19.
The comments by Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus on Wednesd… [+3664 chars]
